channel.title: Stack on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in Stack on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-496. Next Greater Element I
item.description: The next greater element of some element x in an array is the first greater element that is to the right of x in the same array.

item.title: Leetcode-739. Daily Temperatures
item.description: <解題> class Solution { public int[] dailyTemperatures(int[] temperatures) { Deque<Integer> stack = new ArrayDeque<>(); // 創建一個整數陣列用來存儲每一天需要等待的天數 int[] res = new int[temperatures.

item.title: Leetcode-71. Simplify Path
item.description: Given a string path, which is an absolute path (starting with a slash ‘/’) to a file or directory in a Unix-style file system, convert it to the simplified canonical path.

item.title: Leetcode-20. Valid Parentheses
item.description: Given a string s containing just the characters ‘(’, ‘)’, ‘{’, ‘}’, ‘[’ and ‘]’, determine if the input string is valid.
